## colorDataFitsRGB\_Gamut() function

Check if a color data object fits the `sRGB` gamut.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function colorDataFitsRGB_Gamut(x: ColorData): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  x | [ColorData](./css-color-parser.colordata.md) | The color data to be checked. |

**Returns:**

boolean

{<!-- -->boolean<!-- -->} Whether the color data fits the `sRGB` gamut.
